comments.body:
Please add the `conda-inspect` test like https://github.com/conda-forge/nco-feedstock/blob/master/recipe/meta.yaml#L47-L48

It helps us to investigate the linkages.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@test:
  imports:
    - trottersuzuki
  commands:
    - conda inspect linkages -p $PREFIX trottersuzuki  # [not win]
